description: Ready in three steps, follow this easy recipe for an elegant gluten-free cake with subtly sweet flavours of rosewater and raspberries.
name: Gluten-Free Raspberry & Rosewater Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup unsalted pistachio kernels, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Lightly grease a 23cm (3.5cm deep) round loose-based fluted tart pan.

Using an electric mixer, beat butter, sugar, eggs, almond meal, flour and essence in a large bowl until just combined. Spoon mixture into pan and smooth top. Scatter over pistachios and raspberries. Bake for 35 minutes or until golden and cake springs back when gently pressed. Allow to cool completely in pan.
Remove cake from pan, cut into wedges and serve with yoghurt.
